resources.string: Please control your credentials and try again. If the credentials are correct, please contact your supervisor.
Request rejected by Repzone services. Please control your information and try again.
Please check your information and try again.
Try again later to work with current data.
This action will stop register operation. Are you sure?
Your registration not completed. Please enter again.
Repzone will be ready. Please wait...
All rights reserved. Various trademarks held by their respective owners.
Another visit has been started at %1$s. Would you like to start new visit? You can continue after that.
There are mandatory forms in active visit (%1$s), you should complete them first to continue.
There are mandatory forms in active visit (%1$s), do you still want to finish the active visit and start a new one?
You should start visit to continue for any action.
You should start visit to continue for any action, Would you like to start new visit ?
You will lost unsaved data. Are you sure?
There is no any item in basket.
Repzone setting has been updated. Please restart app.
System can not define location information.
Something gone wrong while installing Repzone.
Something gone wrong while installing Repzone.
Please control internet connection for fresh data.
Repzone have to replicate by server. Please check internet connection and start again.
Element will be remove. Are you sure?
Link doesn not have any url.
%1$s entries will be lost. Are you sure?
Google login page will be open, please login with it. Repzone will continue after your login.
Customer has unpaid invoice with issue date (%1$s) before defined maximum allowable due days (%2$s). Do you want to continue?
You did not let Repzone to use your location. Therefore, location info will not be saved in your Visits or Visit Actions or Eagle Eye module (if it is activated).
There is an AutoSave for this form (%1$s). Would you like to load that AutoSave?
Form will save and it will send to Repzone. Are you sure?
Form will save as draft. Do you want to continue?
You will lost entered order. Are you sure?
Form is saving, and It will be sent to Repzone.
Order information is saving, and it will be sent to Repzone.
Visit information is saving, and it will ber sent to Repzone.
It is required to fill in the form called '%1$s' every month. Do you want to fill the form now ?
It is required to fill in the form called '%1$s' every month. You will redirect to the form now.
It is required to fill in the form called '%1$s' every two weeks. Do you want to fill the form now ?
It is required to fill in the form called '%1$s' every two weeks. You will redirect to the form now.
{It is required to fill in the form called '%1$s' every week. Do you want to fill the form now ?
{It is required to fill in the form called '%1$s' every week. You will redirect to the form now.
It is required to fill in the form called '%1$s' at least once. Do you want to fill the form now ?
It is required to fill in the form called '%1$s' every visit. You will redirect to the form now.
Task has been finished right now
If there is a price change in the basket, it will be updated. Do you want to continue ?
All Task steps have done. Task will be marked as completed.
Task will be completed entirely but all unfinished task steps will be marked as cancelled. Do you want to continue ?
Representative warehouse has not found. Please contact your supervisor.
Please enter a valid discount percentage.
Changed price should be between %1$s and %2$s
The verification code sent to your phone successfully. Please enter that code.
Your distance to the point is more than %1$sm: %2$s%3$s Do you want to continue?
Your distance to the point is more than %1$sm: %2$s%3$s
You are off until %1$s due to %2$s
Filter will be cleared. Do you want to continue?
Min price value can not be higher than Max value.
Leaving Reason has not selected. Therefore, you can not approve.
Visit will be finished. Do you want to continue ?
You have an unfinished visit at %1$s. Please finish and continue.
You have an unfinished visit at %1$s. It will be finished automatically.
You have not entered any data. Please fill the form then try again.
You can not send SMS again in %1$s seconds.
Leave duration limit Exceeded. Your leave duration limit: %1$s
Location is not defined on customer address. Do you want to define it now ?
Visit Type has not selected. Therefore, you can not approve.
Do you approve that pinned location is valid location for the customer?
You will redirect to replication page in order to send unsent data.
You can update customer location. Do you want to update it now ?
Location is already defined on customer address. You can not change the location.
Return to Work Date cannot be earlier than Start Date
Start Date cannot be earlier than Today
Start Date and Return to Work Date cannot be the same
Leave Request failed. Please try again later.
End Date cannot be earlier than Start Date.
Error occured while saving the note, please try again.
You will lost entered note. Are you sure?
Break Request failed. Please try again later.
Quick Access Form is not defined.
Due Date can not be empty.
Total Amount can not be empty.
Total Amount must be greater than zero.
Descriptin area is out of limits, please enter a valid description.
Payment information is saving, and it will send to Repzone.
Product Amount can not be less than Minimum Order Quantity: %1$s
Product Amount can not be more than Maximum Order Quantity: %1$s
Product Amount must be a multiple of Order Quantity Factor value: %1$s
Repzone collects location data to enable 'Eagle Eye' feature even when the app is running background. Please select "Always" on location services for Repzone.
To allow manager check your route compliance and to see map for tracked activities, allow Repzone to use your location all of the time.
Repzone collects location data to track current location of the team and the route they followed even when the app is closed or not in use.
Customer information is saving, and It will be sent to Repzone.
%1$s field can not be less than %2$s characters.
%1$s successfully added to your route. Would you like to start visit to the customer now?
%1$s successfully saved but cant added to your route. Please contact your supervisor.
Code will be generated with template
Camera permission has not given. Please go to device options.
Photos permission has not given. Please go to device options.
Gallery permission has not given. Please go to device options.
Category has not selected. Therefore, you can not send feedback.
You can enter additional information here
Feedback message is too long. Please edit your message.
No printers added. Please add a paired printer via + button.
Do you want to add a printer named '%1$s' as default for '%2$s' document types ?
Warehouse selection is mandatory. Please select a warehouse.
Order document will be sent to selected email addresses: (%1$s) Do you want to sent now ?
Document Label selection is mandatory. Please select a label.
New version available: %1$s\n\nPlease continue by downloading the latest version.
There is no route definition for the customer, please contact your supervisor.
There is no information about the customer, please contact your supervisor.
This customer is blocked for visit operations. Do you want to continue?
Total Document Label selection count is too many. Please select fewer labels.
Total selection count is too many. Please select fewer.
You will declare that you won't visit this route point. Do you want to continue ?
Your decision not to visit this point has been successfully reported to the Repzone.
Start Date cannot be earlier than backward limit. Your backward limit: %1$s day(s)
Document will be deleted. Do you want to continue?
Order will be sent. Do you want to continue?
Order will be saved as draft. Do you want to continue?
You can not sync repeatly. Please wait 5 mins and try again.
Description is mandatory. Therefore, you can not approve.
%1$s Reason has not selected. Therefore, you can not approve.
You will be directed to %1$s. Dou want to continue ?
No photo found in last form
There must be at least 1 photo
Customer name can not bu empty
Selected photo will be deleted. Do you want to continue ?
You can add up to 5 photos.
To add photo, please tap 'Add New Photo' button.
New customer info is sending to Repzone
You have requested %1$s different SKUs. Do you want to continue ?
Check internet connection and please try again.
Document is ready. Please pick how to proceed.
Form has not been sent. Please try to sent again.
Selected campaign lines will be applied only. Do you want to continue ?
Account Number can not be empty.
Please start the visit with the Check-in button first.
Document Number could not fetched, please try again later.
Username and password cannot be empty
Server error, please try again later
This customer is an e-invoice taxpayer
Some required fields are missing or invalid.
GPS interval must be at least 1 minute.
Sync interval must be at least 1 minute.
GPS minimum distance cannot be negative.
GPS accuracy threshold cannot be negative.
GPS data has never been synchronized.
At least one active day must be selected.
Currently outside working hours. Next shift in %1$d minutes.
GPS module is turned off, the system cannot receive GPS data...
Your location information is being collected...
All GPS data has been sent...
Please enable location services for GPS tracking
To allow GPS tracking your device's location services (GPS) must be turned on. Tap to open settings.
You need to enable location services
GPS tracking will start in %1$d minutes
GPS tracking will stop in %1$d minutes
Battery %1$d — GPS interval raised to %2$d minutes
Your battery level is low (%1$d). To save battery, GPS tracking interval was raised to %2$d minutes.
%1$d locations are pending sync. They will be sent automatically when connected to Wi-Fi.
Valid Discount Promotion Slot Not Found...
You do not have permission to manually enter the discount line named %1$s...
You can enter a maximum of %1$d%%...
Tap to capture electronic signature for the order
You will be redirected to the electronic signature screen. Do you want to continue?
Please select a payment plan to continue.
Your basket is empty.\nGo back to add products.
Are you sure you want to remove this product from the basket?
Basket is empty, add products to save
Quantity must be greater than zero
